about_the_game:
DLC is provided purely for the purposes of enjoyment, and as a means
for users to support the game's developers. It is not needed to clear the game.
Purchase this downloadable content to acquire unlimited ammunition for all firearms in QuietMansion1.

[In-game instructions]
After purchasing this DLC, the new selectable item "Unlimited Ammo" will be added to the Settings menu on the title screen. Turn this on to give yourself unlimited ammunition.

DLC is provided purely for the purposes of enjoyment, and as a means
for users to support the game's developers. It is not needed to clear the game.
